SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view

Class View

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.util.observer.ObservableObject<ViewListener>
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.View
All Implemented Interfaces:
Listener, ModelListener, Observable<ViewListener>
Direct Known Subclasses:
ViewCli, ViewGui
public abstract class View extends ObservableObject<ViewListener> implements ModelListener
Represents a generic view. The view is run on a different thread and can be observed by listeners while observing the model.

    • finalizeUpdate

      public abstract void finalizeUpdate()
      Executes all the procedures needed to correctly show the last update to the user. Procedures may vary based on the view's necessities: ie graphics updates, housekeeping and others.

      recipient - recipient of the private message.

    • notifyPickCommand

      public void notifyPickCommand(int row1, int col1, int row2, int col2)
      Notifies all listeners that the player has requested to pick tiles from the board.
      Parameters:
      row1 - row coordinate of the first tile in the range.
      col1 - column coordinate of the first tile in the range.
      row2 - row coordinate of the second tile in the range.
      col2 - column coordinate of the second tile in the range.

    • notifyOrderCommand

      public void notifyOrderCommand(int first, int second, int third)
      Notifies all listeners that the player has requested to order the picked tiles.
      Parameters:
      first - index of the first tile to drop.
      second - index of the second tile to drop.
      third - index of the third tile to drop.

    • notifyDropCommand

      public void notifyDropCommand(int column)
      Notifies all listeners that the player has requested to drop tiles in the bookshelf.
      Parameters:
      column - column of the bookshelf where to drop the tiles.

    • notifyGenericInput

      public void notifyGenericInput(String rawInput)
      Notifies all listeners that an unrecognized command has been received.
      Parameters:
      rawInput - input received.
